S1
PRODUCT.SHORTFEATURES:
Custom Solutions and Consultancy

Moxie's highly proficient and competitive team with long experience in design, development, production provides state of art solution for customer specific design or development challenge.
We work with various customers for
  • Consultancy: Customer specific electronic design consultancy
  • Services: Services ranging from driver to complete product development.

PRODUCT.NAME: MSLD6D
MSLD6D
PRODUCT.NAMEADDON: 6V Solar LED Lantern Driver Continous Dimming
PRODUCT.SUMMARY: "Solar Lantern LED Driver and SMF Battery Charger with PWM Dimming, mobile phone charging"
PRODUCT.FEATURES:
High efficiency > 85%
PWM Dimming
Battery reverse discharging protection
LED charging indicator
Battery over voltage protection
Best suited for commercial 6V SMF solar charged lanterns
Solder free design
Low cost
PRODUCT.SHORTFEATURES:
High efficiency > 85%
PWM Dimming
Protection Circuit
6V SMF solar charged lanterns
Low cost
PRODUCT.APPLICATION:
MSLD6D is a high efficiency LED driver with SMF battery charging for 6V SMF and efficient PWM Dimming control. It houses state of art protection circuits for Battery reverse charging, over voltage protection.

This is best suited for designing of Solar Lanterns, powered with 6V SMF battery. It can drive LED string with output power 1.5W to 2.4W,

PRODUCT.NAME: MSLD63D
MSLD63D
PRODUCT.NAMEADDON: 6V Solar LED Lantern Driver 3 Stage Dimming
PRODUCT.SUMMARY: "Constant Current Constant Voltage Solar Lantern LED driver with protection circuit, three stage dimmer"
PRODUCT.FEATURES:
High efficiency
Constant Current LED driver
Three Stage Dimming – (300mA, 200 mA, 100 mA)
Input – 6V SMF(5.25V to 6.5V)
Output Voltage: 9.6V(Boost)
High and Low Voltage Indicator – 5.25V and 6.5V
Energy Efficient – no power consumption during off mode
Battery Over Voltage Protection
Battery Reverse Charging Protection
Mobile Charger(O/P 5.5V, 350mA)
PRODUCT.SHORTFEATURES:
High efficiency
Constant Current LED driver
3 Stage Dimming
Protection Circuit
6V SMF solar charged lanterns
Low cost
PRODUCT.APPLICATION:
MSLD63D is a high efficiency LED driver with SMF battery Charging for 6V SMF battery and efficient three stage Dimming Control.

Its high/low voltage control, state of art protection circuit for Battery Reverse Charging and Battery Over Voltage.

This is best suited for designing of Solar Lanterns, powered with 6V SMF battery.

It can drive LED string with output power .96W to 3.4W. For best efficiency use LED strips in series each having forward voltage,Vf(Typ) 3.2 V

PRODUCT.NAME: MSLD12M
MSLD12M
PRODUCT.SUMMARY: MNRE Compliant Solar Lantern LED Driver and Battery Charger
PRODUCT.FEATURES:
High efficiency > 85%
Regulated Voltage, Constant Current LED driver
Battery reverse polarity protection
No load protection
Low voltage(11.4V)/over charge(14 V) cutoff
Best suited for commercial 12V SMF solar charged lanterns
Solder free design Low cost
PRODUCT.SHORTFEATURES:
High efficiency > 85%
MNRE Specifications
Protection Circuit
12V SMF solar charged lanterns
Low cost
PRODUCT.APPLICATION:
MSLD6D is a high efficiency LED driver with SMF battery charging for 12V SMF. It is compliant to MNRE specifications for protection circuit requirements and indicators requirement.

It houses state of art protection circuits for Battery reverse charging, over voltage protection.

This is best suited for designing of Solar Lanterns, powered with 12V SMF battery. It can drive LED string with output power 2W to 3.5W

PRODUCT.NAME: MSLD62M-FULL-LANTERN
MSLD62M
PRODUCT.SUMMARY: "Solar LED Lantern with 6V SMF Battery, 1-3 W solar panel, 154 Lumen, mobile phone charging"
PRODUCT.FEATURES:
Battery Type SMF Lead Acid
Voltage 6 Volt
Capability 4.5AH
Make LEON/AMCO
LED MAKE OSRAM
Watt 1-3 W
Lumen 154
Angle 270
Quantity 2Nos
Solar Panel Poly Crystalline Solar Cell with wire and DC connector 3W
PCB Step up mode Double Side
Diversity mode
Cell phone charger
PCB High Mode 10 Hours
Low Mode 160 Hours
Colour Different Colour models are possible
PRODUCT.SHORTFEATURES:
Battery 6V SMF,4AH
LED OSRAM, 1-3W
Solar Panel Poly Crystalling, 3W
PCB Double Sided
Mobile Charger
PRODUCT.APPLICATION:
MSLD62M FULL LANTERN is based on MSLD62M LED driver. Lantern have sleek and smart design.

This is best suited for commercial market with efficient but low cost lantern. It can drive LED string with output power 1 to 3W,
